none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 16, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
I got a few of Spencer's castoffs last week (I welcome everyone's castoffs, of course), and the first thing I popped in was this monster from BICSKA, a dark and heavy power excursion masquerading as modern metallic hardcore. Early '00s Eurocore discordance with FALL SILENT bass and an underlying vibe that's hard to put a point on...but rest assured that its dark.  NYUGALOM

seo.title: Bicska - Nyugalom - Terminal Escape
